attributes.action: have Frankie Boyle return to 'Mock The Week'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an official petition to have Frankie Boyle return to the quiz show 'Mock The Week'. Frankie is an asset to the quiz show and British lives are not the same with out him.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
